item.title: Kate add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Thatâ€™s one of the reasons I never wanted to get married. The last thing I wanted was infinite security and to be the place an arrow shoots off from. I wanted change and excitement and to shoot off in all directions myself, like the colored arrows from a Fourth of July rocket." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Kate add a quote by H.L. Mencken
item.description: "Conscience is the inner voice that warns us somebody may be looking." -- H.L. Mencken

item.title: Kate add a quote by Brian Aldiss
item.description: "It is at night... that the mind is most clear, that we are most able to hold all our life in the palm of our skull." -- Brian Aldiss

item.title: Kate add a quote by Samuel Goldwyn
item.description: "Anyone who goes to a psychiatrist ought to have his head examined." -- Samuel Goldwyn

item.title: Kate add a quote by Bernard of Clairvaux
item.description: "hell is full of good wishes and desires." -- Bernard of Clairvaux

item.title: Kate add a quote by B. F. Skinner
item.description: "We do not choose survival as a value, it chooses us." -- B. F. Skinner

item.title: Kate add a quote by Moby
item.description: "Because we find something distasteful is not justification enough for us to deem it criminal." -- Moby

item.title: Kate add a quote by Joseph Stalin
item.description: "A single death is a tragedy; a million deaths is a statistic." -- Joseph Stalin

item.title: Kate add a quote by Mitch Albom
item.description: "I traded lots of dreams for a bigger paycheck, and I never even realized I was doing it." -- Mitch Albom

item.title: Kate add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To be popular one must be a mediocrity." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kate add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "How can you be so many women to so many strange people, oh you strange girl?" -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Kate add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "In every school I've gone to, all the athletic bastards stick together." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Kate add a quote by Zelda Fitzgerald
item.description: "I am really only myself when I'm somebody else whom I have endowed with these wonderful qualities from my imagination." -- Zelda Fitzgerald

item.title: Kate add a quote by Anton Chekhov
item.description: "Love, respect, friendship, do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something." -- Anton Chekhov

item.title: Kate add a quote by Daniel Keyes
item.description: "Intelligence is one of the greatest human gifts. But all too often a search for knowledge drives out the search for love... Intelligence without the ability to give and receive affection leads to mental and moral breakdown, to neurosis, and possibly even psychosis." -- Daniel Keyes

item.title: Kate add a quote by James Baldwin
item.description: "People pay for what they do, and still more for what they have allowed themselves to become. And they pay for it very simply; by the lives they lead." -- James Baldwin

item.title: Kate add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "High school isn't a very important place. When you're going you think it's a big deal, but when it's over nobody really thinks it was great unless they're beered up." -- Stephen King

item.title: Kate add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Mothers are all slightly insane." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: Kate add a quote by Georges Simenon
item.description: "We are all potentially characters in a novel--with the difference that characters in a novel really get to live their lives to the full." -- Georges Simenon

item.title: Kate add a quote by Pat Conroy
item.description: "You get a little moody sometimes but I think that's because you like to read. People that like to read are always a little fucked up." -- Pat Conroy

item.title: Kate add a quote by Red Smith
item.description: "There's nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and open a vein." -- Red Smith

item.title: Kate add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "I'm sick of not having the courage to be an absolute nobody." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Kate add a quote by J. D. Salinger
item.description: "Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody." -- J. D. Salinger

item.title: Kate add a quote by Ransom Riggs
item.description: "I used to dream about escaping my ordinary life, but m life was never ordinary. I had simply failed to notice how extraordinary it was." -- Ransom Riggs
